entry.title: fimbul-works/observable: A lightweight, strongly-typed TypeScript library for reactive programming patterns, providing observable collections, values, and event handling.
entry.content: A lightweight, strongly-typed TypeScript library for reactive programming patterns, providing observable collections, values, and event handling.

entry.title: ByteHive/WatchBeeForVmix: A lightweight utility that automatically manages vMix playlists by monitoring a folder for file changes. When video files are added, removed, or modified in the watched folder, the tool automatically updates the corresponding vMix playlist.
entry.content: A lightweight utility that automatically manages vMix playlists by monitoring a folder for file changes. When video files are added, removed, or modified in the watched folder, the tool automatically updates the corresponding vMix playlist.

entry.title: thanhhoajs/thanhhoa: ThanhHoa is a lightweight, high-performance web framework for Bun, designed to make server-side development simple and enjoyable.
entry.content: ThanhHoa is a lightweight, high-performance web framework for Bun, designed to make server-side development simple and enjoyable.

entry.title: nezanuha/markdown-text-editor: A simple, lightweight Markdown editor with real-time preview. Write and edit Markdown content effortlessly, with support for syntax highlighting

entry.title: simonwep/viselect: ‚ú® Viselect - A high performance and lightweight library to add a visual way of selecting elements, just like on your Desktop. Zero dependencies, super small. Support for major frameworks!

entry.title: InfinityQuestStudio/questplay-sdk: QuestPlay SDK is a lightweight JavaScript SDK designed to seamlessly embed and manage our games in your web application.

entry.title: yangsnapify/minesweeper-js: A lightweight and easy-to-use Minesweeper game library in JavaScript. Customize the grid size, mine count, and difficulty with minimal setup. Perfect for integrating Minesweeper into your web projects or for building your own game.
entry.content: A lightweight and easy-to-use Minesweeper game library in JavaScript. Customize the grid size, mine count, and difficulty with minimal setup. Perfect for integrating Minesweeper into your web projects or for building your own game.

entry.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
entry.content: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

entry.title: SHREYASHHH21/PulseTalk: A lightweight, real-time chat application built with Node.js, Express, and Socket.IO. This project demonstrates how to implement WebSocket communication for instant messaging between users. It serves as a foundation for building scalable and feature-rich chat platforms.
entry.content: A lightweight, real-time chat application built with Node.js, Express, and Socket.IO. This project demonstrates how to implement WebSocket communication for instant messaging between users. It serves as a foundation for building scalable and feature-rich chat platforms.

entry.title: zayne-labs/call-api: A zero-race-condition fetch wrapper packed with essential features - timeouts, retries, interceptors, and much more, all while still retained a similar API surface with fetch. Power and simplicity in one lightweight package.

entry.title: Tim-ru/bugspot-widget: BugSpot is a lightweight widget that allows users to report issues directly from your website. It helps developers gather feedback with minimal friction, making it easier to identify and fix bugs.
